attributes.action: force people in council housing to downgrade to smaller properties if all bedroom are not in use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are always being told there's a shortage of family council houses, however where i live a fast majority of theses houses are lived in by single oaps. this is to make ALL councils force people who are in council properties to downgrade to a smaller property when all bedrooms are no longer needed.
